attributes.additional_details:
The current fare prices are having a crippling effect on low wage earners those on minimum wages face the same fares as a director or a worker on far more money
Low pay wages add high fares are driving those to make a choice give up work or sign on its that simple but 16 yr old who want to work are paid even less which is unfair and unjust a million teens ate unemployed and those who get a job are losing a large amount of thier wages  just getting to work  something must be done to help our kids  back to work students also

rejection.details: There have been many petitions on this topic; however, this one does not specify what the petitioners are asking the Government to do.
